asset.author: Camp Chef
asset.hookText:
http://www.campchef.com/deluxe-bbq-grill-box-90-accessory.html

Memorial Day is only a couple of weeks away. Instead of doing the same old hamburgers and hot dogs for your family and friends, why not grill up some tri-tip. Grilled tri-tip is a lot easier to make than you think. With some simple store bought seasonings and a Camp Chef grill box you can have a crowd favorite meal ready in under an hour. Follow along with Matt from Camp Chef as he walks you through what is sure to become a Memorial Day tradition.
